td.p: Specifies the directory under which wiki templates in xdoc format are expected to be found.
Specifies the directory under which wiki specific images are expected to be found.
Specifies the absolute path of the css directory. This is required because it seems that pl scripts donot deal well with relative import directives.
Specifies the realtive path from wiki pages to the site root. This allow to update no absolute links and image src to point to correct location.
For instance if you have configured your wiki so that MyPage is viewed with the url /cgi-bin/view.pl/MyPage, this property should be set to ../..
